structure.unit: ARTICLE II. LICENSING AND REGULATION OF FOR-HIRE MOTOR VEHICLES

text.section:
Sec. 31-83. Chauffeur's registration.
It shall be unlawful for any person to drive a taxicab or limousine over any street in Miami-Dade County without first having obtained a chauffeur's registration from the CSD pursuant to, Article V of this Code. Effective January 1, 2000, every initial taxicab chauffeur shall be required to complete an apprentice program as prescribed by the CSD.
